title: Bronze hasta

properties.name: description
properties.value: The bronze hasta is a one-handed melee members-only weapon, similar to the spear. It is the weakest hasta in RuneScape. To wield this weapon, players need to have completed Barbarian Training in Smithing. To obtain a bronze hasta the player can either create one using the Smithing skill or trade with another player. It can be poisoned.

The bronze hasta is a one-handed melee members-only weapon, similar to the spear. It is the weakest hasta in RuneScape. To wield this weapon, players need to have completed Barbarian Training in Smithing. To obtain a bronze hasta the player can either create one using the Smithing skill or trade with another player. It can be poisoned.

Poison++Karambwan poison

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
7 July 2021
(update)

The position of the weapon and its variants on female players has been adjusted so that they appear to be equipped properly.

21 April 2021
(update)

The hasta's attack speed has been decreased from 5 (every 3.0 seconds) to 4 (every 2.4 seconds).

The '''bronze hasta''' is a one-handed [[melee]] [[members]]-only [[weapon]], similar to the [[spear]]. It is the weakest [[hasta]] in ''[[RuneScape]]''. To wield this weapon, players need to have completed [[Barbarian Training]] in [[Smithing]]. To obtain a bronze hasta the player can either create one using the [[Smithing]] skill or trade with another player. It can be [[poison]]ed.
